prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Benjamin Bunn, 1932-1944, Accession #10962-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This additional material was given to the Library by Mrs. Imogene Bunn of Charlottesville, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Benjamin Bunn papers, 1932-1944, contains five items, including his ministerial license issued by the Calvary Baptist Church, East Orange, New Jersey, and four letters and documents calling the Reverend Benjamin F. Bunn as pastor to the following churches: Beulah Baptist Church, Woodford, Virginia; the Mount Zion Baptist Church, Downings, Virginia; and the First Baptist Church, Charlottesville, Virginia.
